html:
** Electric truck maker's shares RIVN.O pare gains after a report reveals inconsistency in prototype vehicle

** Shares were last up about 6.5% at $131.5 after gaining as much as 13.4%

** Rivian's vans for Amazon.com AMZN.O may have a more limited range than what was previously disclosed, The Information reported, citing a driver testing the vehicle (Full Story)

** Driver told The Information the battery drained about 40% faster than normal if the van's heating or cooling was on

** Stock has gained 16% since its debut earlier in November


(Reporting by Nivedita Balu in Bengaluru)

(( Nivedita.Balu@thomsonreuters.com ; Twitter: https://twitter.com/niveditabalu; ))
